video.title: Wentworth
video.synopsis: Bea Smith is locked up while awaiting trial for the alleged attempted murder of her husband and must learn how life works in prison.

episodes.synopsis: Bea Smith's sentence at Wentworth begins as she sides with tough girl Franky's gang and gets caught up in a riot that leaves the prison governor dead.
episodes.title: No Place Like Home

episodes.synopsis: Harry thwarts Bea's attempts to contact her daughter, and Meg's husband hunts for her killer. Meanwhile, a power struggle leaves Vera humiliated.
episodes.title: Fly Me Away

episodes.synopsis: Franky's estranged father visits, and Bea is caught in Jacs and Franky's rivalry. Meanwhile, Erica attempts to change how Wentworth is run.
episodes.title: The Girl Who Waited

episodes.synopsis: Franky retaliates against Bea's breach of loyalty, and Liz botches a VIP event when she relapses. Meanwhile, Jacs learns of her husband's affair.
episodes.title: The Things We Do

episodes.synopsis: An erotic dream makes Erica uncomfortable with being Franky's tutor, and her growing sexual issues start to affect her relationship with Mark.
episodes.title: The Velvet Curtain

episodes.synopsis: Vera's attempts to assert herself backfire with Fletch and her own mother, and Jacs forces Toni to tell Erica that Franky gave her drugs.
episodes.title: Captive

episodes.synopsis: Jacs has Wentworth in the palm of her hand, and she has a vicious surprise waiting for Franky, who's about to be released back into the compound.
episodes.title: Something Dies

episodes.synopsis: As Bea's popularity grows, Jacs is backed into a corner. She blackmails Will, claims Vera caused Meg's death and plans a final move against her rival.
episodes.title: Mind Games

episodes.synopsis: Bea's grief over her daughter's death is compounded when she is forbidden to attend the funeral. Meanwhile, Jacs triggers her last attack against Bea.
episodes.title: To The Moon

episodes.synopsis: Bea believes Jacs was behind her daughter's death. Meanwhile, Fletch and Vera reconcile, but she comes to believe that he killed Meg.
episodes.title: Checkmate

episodes.synopsis: Hoping to end Franky's stranglehold on Wentworth, new governor Joan Ferguson breaks up her contraband operation and brings Bea back to H Block.
episodes.title: Born Again

episodes.synopsis: Bea agrees to Harry's request for a divorce on the condition that he kill Brayden Holt. Meanwhile, Franky tries to get heroin from a new drug mule.
episodes.title: Whatever It Takes

episodes.synopsis: Brayden Holt's godmother returns to Wentworth, giving Bea hope for revenge. But Franky is troubled by her arrival, as she once worked for Jacs.
episodes.title: Boys In The Yard

episodes.synopsis: Bea learns of the Holts' plan to avenge Brayden and asks Franky to get her a weapon. But the attempts on her life come from an unexpected source.
episodes.title: The Danger Within

episodes.synopsis: Bea uses the news that Simmo's daughter is working for the Holts to her advantage. Meanwhile, Wentworth is turned upside down when Boomer vanishes.
episodes.title: Twist The Knife

episodes.synopsis: Simmo can't bring herself to kill Bea and attempts suicide, only to be saved by Bea. Meanwhile, Ferguson makes use of Franky's illicit drugs.
episodes.title: The Pink Dragon

episodes.synopsis: Ferguson cancels the garden project, Maxine tries to escape when she learns Gary is headed overseas and Franky confronts Ferguson over Simmo's death.
episodes.title: Metamorphosis

episodes.synopsis: Franky is determined to find the snitch in Wentworth, and her evidence points to Bea, who's getting special privileges.
episodes.title: Sins Of The Mother

episodes.synopsis: Ferguson attempts to force Doreen into a lie about the father of her baby. Meanwhile, Will feuds with Harry, who he thinks has been harassing him.
episodes.title: The Fixer

episodes.synopsis: Liz is released from Wentworth but finds life at the halfway house difficult, especially when Boomer threatens to have her attacked.
episodes.title: Jail Birds

episodes.synopsis: The battle lines are drawn between Bea and Franky for domination of Wentworth, and Fletch believes a new inmate may be his key to ousting Ferguson.
episodes.title: Into The Night

episodes.synopsis: Bea flees the hospital and sets out to avenge Debbie's death, Fletch tries to warn Will about Ferguson and Liz prepares to return to Wentworth.
episodes.title: Fear Her
